title.rendered: Employees from Wells Fargo join children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre in a Clay molding and Seed Ball making activity

content.rendered: To change the world, all we need is each other! It was heartwarming to have employees from Wells Fargo joining children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre in Bengaluru and participating in a Clay molding and Seed Ball making activity. Thank you Wells Fargo team for sharing your world with our children, for creating memorable moments, and spreading so many smiles.
